meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a cercaria.
meanings.sent1: The cercarian stage is when the parasite is most active.
meanings.sent2: The cercarian organism has specific features that distinguish it.
meanings.sent3: The cercarian creatures were having a party in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the cercarian world was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The cercarian nature of the creature made it fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: A larval stage in the life cycle of certain trematode parasites.
meanings.sent1: The cercarian swims freely in the water searching for a host.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the cercarian to understand parasite development.
meanings.sent3: The cercarian larva was the mischievous troublemaker of the group.
meanings.sent4: The cercarian stage is like a transformative journey for the parasite.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the cercarian transform is a remarkable sight in nature.
